## wait() function

Waits for the specified delay.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function wait(delay: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  delay | number | delay in milliseconds |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
